title: TIDAL is the latest music streaming service to add Siri integration, here’s how it works
content:
TIDAL finally announced the long-awaited Siri integration. Starting now, subscribers to the music streaming service can ask Apple’s personal assistant to play songs, playlists, albums, and more on the platform. Here’s what you need to know about this update.

more…

The post TIDAL is the latest music streaming service to add Siri integration, here’s how it works appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: TIDAL announces Siri integration. Subscribers to the music streaming service can ask Apple’s personal assistant to play songs and more.
